name: BREAKSTONE'S Creamy Banana-Sour Cream Cake
author: Anonymous
summary: A moist, banana cake is finished with a walnut-cream cheese frosting in this delicious dessert.
ingredients: 1 cup BREAKSTONE'S Reduced Fat Sour Cream
1 (8 ounce) package PHILADELPHIA Cream Cheese, softened
1 cup PLANTERS Walnut Pieces, finely chopped
directions: Beat cake mix, eggs, bananas, sour cream and oil with mixer on low until moistened, scraping bottom of bowl often
Pour into greased and floured 13x9-inch pan
Bake 35 minutes or until toothpick inserted in center comes out clean
Cool cake completely in pan on wire rack
Beat cream cheese and butter with mixer on medium until blended
Gradually add sugar, beating well after each addition
Carefully cut cake crosswise in half using serrated knife
Place 1 cake half, top-side down, on plate; spread top with frosting
Top with remaining cake half, top side up
